title: RecipeHack
details: Enter Ingredients you have a taste for and RecipeHack will give you a few dinner ideas based on your chosen ingredients

title: PropertyMaxx
details: Property management system used to keep track of owned properties or rooms to manage tenants, track workorders and make charges.

title: Shedd Inventory Management
details: Warehouse management system utilizing barcode scanners for simplified rolling inventory and product lookup.

title: Discord Bot - Patsy
details: Patsy is designed to work as a greeter to your discord server based on the sidekick from monty python.
